title: Queues: Viewing a Queue
body:
Queues: Viewing a Queue¶

NEED TO REVISIT

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Platform

  3. Click Queues

  4. Click the number in the row entitled Failed of the desired queue to view

  5. Click the number in the row entitled Completed of the desired queue to view

  6. Click the number in the row entitled Delayed of the desired queue to view

  7. Click a record within Failed, Completed, or Delayed to view details, the job, and any errors

  8. Click and Retry Job to manually retry the job

    • The job will automatically be ran three times

  9. Click and Remove Job to delete the job
toc: • Queues: Viewing a Queue
